# Parse integer
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Parses integer values.

## Parameter

### Comma as decimal point

Use comma as decimal point (uses a point, otherwise)

- Datatype: `boolean`
- Default Value: `false`



### Thousand separator

Use comma or point to separate digits

- Datatype: `boolean`
- Default Value: `false`
